name: tab_prophet
title: Tab Prophet
description: Copying multiple URLs to clipboard at once.
author: Vladislav Zolotaryov

preferences.name: startingClipboardDecorator
preferences.title: Starting characters of your clipboard value
preferences.description: Any string value including escapes for special characters such as:'\n', '\r', '\t'

preferences.name: itemsDelimiter
preferences.title: Delimiter between items
preferences.description: Any string value including escapes for special characters such as:'\n', '\r', '\t'

preferences.name: endingClipboardDecorator
preferences.title: Ending characters of your clipboard value
preferences.description: Any string value including escapes for special characters such as:'\n', '\r', '\t'

preferences.name: selectionToggleKeyCode
preferences.title: Toggle selection key modifier
preferences.description: Choose the toggle modifier that allows you to select tabs to be copied

preferences.name: copyAllTabsModifier
preferences.title: Copy all tabs hotkey modifiers
preferences.description: Key combination that represents the first part of your 'Copy All Tabs' combination

preferences.name: copyAllTabsCharacter
preferences.title: Copy all tabs hotkey character
preferences.description: Character that represents the last part of your 'Copy All Tabs' combination
